page.title: 13Jobs in Conisbrough
page.content: Ther are quite a few different types of{employment}in Conisbrough. Some people travel to a nearby{colliery}to work as miners, surface men and so on. Others work in connection with the pit, and do such jobs as driving lorries, cleaning and working in the canteen. Many people travel every day to the larger nearby towns Mexborough Rotherham and Doncaster to work. In Conisbrough there are several small factories and a toy{factory.}There are a lot of service{industries,}such as shops, that people work in. A few people work in local institutions such as Morley Place school, the old folk's home, and others work in banks, building societies, and estate agent. One of the large growths is unemployment.
